summary: A simple perk one the player blocks activation of furniture (except those that don't trigger a player animation like levers and chains) while sneaking. The name of the blocked furniture item will be shown as --- when blocked so you know it can't be activated while sneaking.
descriptionHtml:
A simple perk on the player blocks activation of furniture (except those that don't trigger a player animation like levers and chains) while sneaking. The name of the blocked furniture item will be shown as --- when blocked so you know it can't be activated while sneaking.

This is intended to avoid sitting or laying down by accident which breaks you out of sneak mode as requested by Taleisen on NexusMods.

May conflict with mods that depend on you activating furniture while sneaking.

Version 1.1 simply removes an unused script reference to keep your papyrus log uncluttered.
author: CDCooley
